articles.content: Apple on Thursday rolled out security updates to iOS, iPadOS, macOS, tvOS, watchOS, and the Safari web browser to address dozens of flaws, including three new zero-days that it said are being activel… [+2726 chars]

articles.author: David Heaney
articles.title: Apple Engineers Got To Build Headset By Promising Glasses - UploadVR
articles.description:
Apple engineers reportedly secured resources to build a headset by promising Tim Cook AR glasses soon after - despite knowing this wasn’t possible.

Read more:
articles.content:
A new report from Bloomberg's Mark Gurman includes some interesting claims about the history of Apple's head mounted displays development effort.

articles.author: Bill Toulas
articles.title: Cybercrime gang pre-infects millions of Android devices with malware - BleepingComputer
articles.description: A cybercriminal tracked as the "Lemon Group" has been infecting millions of Android-based smartphones, watches, TVs, and TV boxes, with a malware strain named 'Guerilla.'
articles.content:
A large cybercrime enterprise tracked as the "Lemon Group" has reportedly pre-installed malware known as 'Guerilla' on almost 9 million Android-based smartphones, watches, TVs, and TV boxes.
The thr… [+5400 chars]
